entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain beginning this morning and ending this afternoon then 40 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle late this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late this morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 late this morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
